    • Method Detail

      • distance

        public static BigInteger distance(NodeId a,
                  NodeId b)
        This is a clockwise ring distance function. It depends on a globally defined k, the key size. The largest possible node id is 2**k.
        Parameters:
        a -
        b -
        Returns:
